Title: Go and settle in the countryside to wage revolution, combat and prevent revisionist change and defend the nation
Designer: Heilongjiang renmin chubanshe (黑龙江人民出版社)
Publisher: Heilongjiang renmin chubanshe (黑龙江人民出版社)
Notes: The banner in the background reads "Go and settle in the countryside to wage revolution". The title of the poster clearly refers to the threat of a Soviet attack.
Theme: Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)Foreign Friends: Soviet Union
